code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskItem=_ref=>{let{task,updateTask,deleteTask}=_ref;const handleCompleteChange=async()=>{const response=await axios.put(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+"/tasks/".concat(task.id),{...task,completed:!task.completed});updateTask(response.data);};const handleDelete=async()=>{await axios.delete(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+"/tasks/".concat(task.id));deleteTask(task.id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:task.completed,onChange:handleCompleteChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{textDecoration:task.completed?'line-through':'none'},children:task.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,children:"Delete"})]});};export default TaskItem;
